fields.name: Classic Fit Kids' Jeans
fields.description: Durable and soft denim jeans, perfect for school or play. Classic fit with 5-pocket styling and a comfortable cut for active kids.

fields.name: Audra Kids' Straight Leg Pants
fields.description: Stylish and comfortable straight-leg pants for kids, featuring an elastic waist for easy wear and durable fabric for everyday use.

fields.name: Cotton T-Shirt - Fun Prints
fields.description: Soft cotton t-shirt with fun, kid-friendly prints. Perfect for casual wear and layering.
